name: C A R G O
description:
When your story begins, tragedy has befallen earth. You are trapped on a ship, enslaved and defeated. Will you exploit a malfunction in your binding and take over the ship? Will you investigate and uncover hidden truths that lead to freedom and salvation? Or will you  truly become a slave in mind and body?

Yours is a story of freedom and redemption… or is it?

The player will have opportunities to find freedom and face consequences for capture.
